Code.Title: New-UDAntdComment
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design comment component

Code.Title: Comment with text
Add nested comment using Add-UDElement
New-UDAntdSteps
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design steps component

Code.Title: New-UDAntdAutoComplete
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design auto complete input

AutoComplete.Title: BASIC
AutoComplete.Description: Just a basic auto complete input

AutoComplete.Title: Custom Input
AutoComplete.Description: You can change the default auto complete input with a custom one.

Code.Title: New-UDAntdNotification
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design notification message

Notification.Title: PRESETS
Notification.Description: Basic notification message with buildin icon

Notification.Title: CUSTOM NOTIFICATION
Notification.Description: Custom notification content with OnClose event

Code.Description: After the first notification close it will open new notification message.

Notification.Title: Placement
Notification.Description: Set the notification placement on the screen.

Code.Description: They are 4 positions: topLeft, topRight, bottomLeft, bottomRight

Notification.Title: Style
Notification.Description: Set the notification style like backgroundColor.

Code.Title: New-UDAntdIcon
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design icon

Icon.Title: TYPES
Icon.Description: They are 3 types of icon style Fill, Outline, TwoTone

Code.Title: OUTLINE
Code.Description: Icon with outline style

Code.Title: FILLED
Code.Description: Icon with filled style

Code.Title: TWOTONE
Code.Description: Icon with twotone style
Notes: NOT! all the icons are TwoTone

Code.Title: New-UDAntdButton
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design button

Button.Title: VARIANT
Button.Description: Ant-Design buttons comes in a numbers of variants

Code.Title: New-UDAntdCard
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design card

Code.Title: BASIC
Code.Description: Card title as text

Card.Title: CARD HEADER
Card.Description: Card can have a top toolbar that can accept title and an array of extra buttons

Code.Title: Title
Code.Description: Card title as text

Code.Title: Extra Buttons
Code.Description: Card header can accepts extra buttons on the right

Code.Title: Style
Code.Description:
Using HeadStyle parameter you can apply custom style to the header.         
                    The value must be an HashTable and can accepts any css attributes

Code.Title: Loading
Code.Description: The loading state can be set using ```Set-UDElement``` command

Code.Title: New-UDAntdSlider
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design slider

Code.Title: Marks Icons
Array
Code.Description: default value in a range slider

Code.Title: Single
Code.Description: default value in a basic slider

Slider.Title: DOTS
Slider.Description: Slider with dots for display steps

Code.Title: New-UDAntdStatistic
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design statistic component

Code.Title: New-UDAntdMessage
Code.Description: Command for creating ant-design message
